column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLThis award-winning online programme from UCL Medical School equips clinicians from all professional backgrounds to deliver the highest standards of education. You can create a completely bespoke programme that suits your interests. Choose to study full-time for one year or study flexibly for up to five years, with Certificate and Diploma exit awards available. If you study flexibly, you pay only for the modules you select each year.
